name: FlashAhAhhhHaiku
0:
”Alexa, open Flash Ah Ahhh Haiku”
”Alexa, launch Flash Ah Ahhh Haiku”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flash ah ahhh haiku
des:
Ask Alexa to open Flash Ah Ahhh Haiku and she'll recite some delightful poems about the hit show brought to you by Stageworks Ink.

To begin just say:

"Alexa, open Flash Ah Ahhh Haiku and tell me a haiku."

"Alexa, ask Flash Haiku for a haiku."

Or simply,

"Alexa, open Flash Haiku."
